official_title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the Third College at the University of California at San Diego should be renamed the "Thurgood Marshall College" in honor of Justice Thurgood Marshall.

summary.text: Declares that the Third College at the University of California, San Diego, should be renamed as the Thurgood Marshall College.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the Third College at the University of California at San Diego should be renamed the "Thurgood Marshall College" in honor of Justice Thurgood Marshall.
